about_the_game:
VICARIOUS is a Hardcore Mech PVP FPS game.

You can select a Mech from variety of choice and go on to the battlefield.
Also Weapons and Units, such as Arms or Legs are customizeble in Customization Menu.
Build your mech as you want and strategize your battle.

In the battle, each Mech has "Core HP" and "Unit HP".
"Core HP" is the literary Core HP of your Mech. It can't be restored exept a special circumstances.
"Unit HP" is the partial HP of the units compose your Mech. When its damaged your mech will cause malfunctions or ultimately out of action.
"Unit HP" can be restored with consumable "Nano Machine System".

The game have 2 gamemode, TDM and Domination.
In TDM rule, your goal is eliminating all enemies mech in each round.
In Domination , your goal is capture a particular area with stay inside of it.
